# ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Management Errors
- Ensure required materials are in inventory before attempting crafting operations
- Check if raw materials need to be gathered or smelted before attempting to craft items that require processed materials

### Recipe Requirements Errors
- Some items like copper plates and iron plates must be smelted in furnaces, they cannot be directly crafted
- Raw resources like wood must be gathered from the environment, they cannot be crafted

### Entity Placement Errors
- Verify you have the required entity in inventory before attempting placement
- Ensure proper positioning and spacing when placing buildings

### Programming/API Errors
- Cannot perform arithmetic operations directly on entity prototype attributes
- Use proper attribute access methods for entity dimensions and properties

### Connection Errors
- Ensure you have required connection items (like pipes) in inventory before attempting to connect entities
- Verify entities are within connection range of each other

### Power System Errors
- Ensure all components of power system are properly connected
- Maintain fuel supply in boilers to keep power generation active
